page.title: /defaults
page.description: Default apps and tools I use
page.content:
Defaults

Inspired by defaults.rknight.me

My Default Apps

  • Mail: Shortwave
  • Notes: Obsidian
  • Calendar: Notion Calendar
  • RSS: Reeder
  • Browser: Arc
  • Code Editor: Cursor
  • Terminal: Warp
  • Cloud Storage: A combination of GDrive, iCloud and a private Cloud
  • Photo Library: Immich (self hosted)
  • Music: Spotify
  • Podcasts: Overcast
  • Password Manager: 1Password
  • Task Manager: Obsidian
